archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0166
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a product owner, I want customers who activate a SIM card without a preprovisioned plan to be taken through a plan purchase journey to setup subscription billing & get a plan

properties.value: OLD: After a customer buys a blank sim, he should be able to activate it without selecting any plan (via IVR or webpage) - then the subscription becomes a "no plan" subscription in which he is able to make free calls and answer calls. When in this state he is able to select a proper plan. The plan is to allow the customer in no plan state for max of 12 months. After that the SIM should be deactivated. Agreed during workshop: Blank SIM cannot be used by the customer, when he tries to make voice or data connection he will be redirected to IVR or website. "No plan" status will be available only after "grace period".

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
